description: Retrieves the classification scope settings for an account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon Macie resource that the request applies to.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the classification scope.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the classification scope: automated-sensitive-data-discovery.

nested_items.name: bucketNames
nested_items.description: An array of strings, one for each S3 bucket that is excluded. Each string is the full name of an excluded bucket.
